dgvSetting.Note: The data are 4 tab deliminated columns in the order: text, section, and value text in [ ] is treated as header
dgvSetting.Data:
[Laser Diode] Default Current (mA) LaserDiode DefaultCurrent Min Current (mA) LaserDiode MinCurrent Max Current (mA) LaserDiode MaxCurrent Current Step (mA) LaserDiode CurrentStep Min Voltage (V) LaserDiode MinVoltage Max Current Error (mA) LaserDiode MaxCurrentError
[Beam Scan] Samples BeamScan Samples Internal Gain BeamScan Gain Sample Freq (Hz) BeamScan SampleFrequency Sample Reso (um) BeamScan SampleResolution
[Probe Clamp] FOrce (%) ProbeClamp Force Speed (%) ProbeClamp Speed Open Position (mm) ProbeClamp OpenPosition
[Vacuum CDA] Min Vacuum Change (kPa) VacuumCda MinVacuumChange

dgvForceGauge.Note: The data are 4 tab deliminated columns in the order: text, section, and value text in [ ] is treated as header
dgvForceGauge.Data:
[Force Gauge] Samples zTouchSense Samples Force Threshold zTouchSense ForceChangeThreshold
[Stage Setting] Stage Speed (m/s) zTouchSense Velocity Step Size (mm) zTouchSense StepSize Max Z Move (mm) zTouchSense MaxMove
[Bond Line Control] Gap for PBS (mm) zTouchSense BondLineBS Gap for Lens - Min (mm) zTouchSense BondLineLensMin Gap for Lens - Max (mm) zTouchSense BondLineLensMax
[Gap after Z Touch] Part Pickup (mm) zTouchSense GapForPartPickup Apply Epoxy (mm) zTouchSense GapForApplyEpoxy All Others (mm) zTouchSense GapForOther
[Post Epoxy Move back] Stage Speed (m/s) zSlowMove Velocity Step Size (mm) zSlowMove StepSize Step Count zSlowMove StepCount Step Delat (ms) zSlowMove StepDelay

dgvAlignment.Note: The data are 4 tab deliminated columns in the order: text, section, and value text in [ ] is treated as header
dgvAlignment.Data:
[Requirement] Max Delta Y (mm) Alignment MaxSteeringY Max Delat Z (mm) Alignment MaxSteeringZ Minimum Y (mm) Alignment MinY Maximum Y (mm) Alignment MaxY Minimum Z (mm) Alignment MinX Maximum Z (mm) Alignment MaxX Minimum Power Alignment MinPower Maximum Power Alignment MaxPower
[Stage Setting] Speed (m/s) Alignment StageSpeed Step Size X Coarse (mm) Alignment StageStepX Step Size X Fine (mm) Alignment StageStepFineX Max X Move (mm) Alignment MaxStageMoveX Max Y Move (mm) Alignment MaxStageMoveY Max Z Move (mm) Alignment MaxStageMoveZ Max Angle Move (mm) Alignment MaxStageMoveAngle
[Beam Data] PBS Angle Coef (Deg/mm) Alignment AngleCoef Forcal Legth (mm) Alignment FocalLength L Near to Lens (mm) Alignment BeamScanXOffset Position List (mm) Alignment BeamScanXList
[Post Epoxy Adjustment] Max Movement (mm) Alignment PostEpoxyMaxMove Step Size (mm) Alignment PostEpoxyStepSize
